player_news.trend_summary: Edoardo Bove has opened up about his life after suffering a heart attack, admitting that he feels incomplete without football. The Roma midfielder, who collapsed during a pre-season friendly in July, has been sidelined since but is determined to return to action.

news.title: Edoardo Bove details life after heart attack: “Without football, I feel like a part of me is missing.”
news.description: Edoardo Bove details life after heart attack: “Without football, I feel like a part of me is missing.”  RomaPress.net

news.title: Bove: ‘I understand how thin the line between life and death is’

player_news.player_name: Omar Khaled Mohamed Abd Elsala Marmoush
player_news.trend_summary: Omar Marmoush etched his name into Manchester City history with a remarkable 14-minute hat-trick against Newcastle, becoming the first City player to score three goals in a Premier League match since Erling Haaland. The Egyptian striker's impressive performance has raised expectations, with Pep Guardiola praising Marmoush's ability to create scoring opportunities and warning Real Madrid ahead of their upcoming Champions League clash.

player_news.trend_summary: Mikel Merino's unlikely heroics as an emergency striker propelled Arsenal to a crucial 2-0 victory over Leicester City, keeping their Premier League title hopes alive. The midfielder's brace, a rare occurrence in his career, proved decisive as Arsenal secured a vital three points to maintain their title challenge.
